title: Heavy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check someone each night to discover if they killed you.
- Shoot someone during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, the entire town will receive the message in the photo attached to this role card.
- You are considered dead, but you function as if you are alive meaning that you can perform abilities and talk/whisper during the day. However, you cannot vote.
- No players in the game may use their abilities or vote against you, but you can be whispered to.
- A random player in the game killed you. They will be notified when they receive their role card. You will be notified if this player dies.
- You may check three people and kill one person.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure the person that killed you is not alive at the end of the game.

desc:
Post 136
*It is good day to be not dead!*
